org.safs.install

Class AndroidInstaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.install.InstallerImpl
      • org.safs.install.AndroidInstaller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InstallerInterface

    public class AndroidInstaller
extends InstallerImpl
    Handle Windows registration and Environment settings for Android SDK support. Intended to replace WSH install scripts.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • install

        public boolean install(java.lang.String... args)
        Main processing routine. Sets System Environment variables used by SAFS Android Support:

        ROBOTIUMRC_HOME

        boolean success = AndroidInstaller.intall();

        Parameters:
        args - -- none used at this time
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise.

      • uninstall

        public boolean uninstall(java.lang.String... args)
        Unset the System Environment Variables used by SAFS.

        ROBOTIUMRC_HOME

        Parameters:
        args -
        Returns:

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main Java executable. Primarily to run standalone outside of a larger process.

        %SAFSDIR%\jre\bin\java org.safs.install.AndroidInstaller

        %SAFSDIR%\jre\bin\java org.safs.install.AndroidInstaller -u

        System.exit(0) on perceived success.
        System.exit(-1) on perceived failure.

        Parameters:
        args - -- -u to perform an uninstall instead of install.
        See Also:
        SilentInstaller
